content:
This morning, we submitted a list of comments for a block-vote-3b, 3d, and 3e as well as a single ticket FHIR-26908 for vote for the CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange (CARIN IG for Blue Button®) IG ballot (2020-Feb-BLUEBUTTON R1 STU). You may withdraw any item from the block vote by responding to this email with the specific Key for the item you wish to withdraw or do so on the FM WG call prior to the vote.

We’d like to put the below up for block vote during the regularly scheduled Financial Management call on September 15.

Block vote 3b contains 6 ballot comments related to NCPDP from the following individual:

1) Pat Taylor (6)
A link to the comments in JIRA can be found here

Block vote 3d contains 3 ballot comments related to X12/CMS from the following individual:

1) Pat Taylor (3)
A link to the comments in JIRA can be found here

Block vote 3e contains 2 ballot comments related to CMS from the following individual:

1) Pat Taylor (2)
A link to the comments in JIRA can be found here

FHIR-26908 vote contains 1 ballot comments related to FDA NDC from the following individual:

1) Pat Taylor (1)
A link to the comment in JIRA can be found here
